sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './styles.css' export default function ListingAd({ store }) { const { pic, title, address, description, psf_min, psf_max, subprice_label, availabilities_label, project_type, ownership_type, year, } = store const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => { setClick(!click) if (click) { document.getElementById('button-text').innerHTML = 'See description' } else { document.getElementById('button-text').innerHTML = 'Close description' } } const formatted_description = description.split('\n').map((line, index) => (
{line}
)) const per_square_foot = `$${psf_min.toLocaleString()} - $${psf_max.toLocaleString()} psf` const properties_type = `${project_type} · ${year} · ${ownership_type}` return (
Launching Soon

{title}

{address}

{properties_type}

{availabilities_label}

{per_square_foot}

{subprice_label}

{click && (
{formatted_description}
)}
) }
